value.message: Variable 'f' in map callback is an arbitrary abbreviation; use a more descriptive name.
Catch block does not log error stack trace or context information.
value.suggestion: Log both error message and stack trace, and include relevant context such as input parameters.

value.message: Catch block does not log error details or context information.
value.suggestion: Log error message and stack trace, and include context such as feedback ID.

value.message: Catch block does not log error details or context information.
value.suggestion: Log error message and stack trace, and include context such as feedback ID and reply message.

value.message: Delete operation uses client-supplied id without verifying resource ownership or authorization.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend verifies that the feedback id belongs to the current user and that the user is authorized to delete it before performing the operation.
value.codeSnippet: if (!window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this feedback?"))

value.message: Reply operation uses client-supplied id without verifying resource ownership or authorization.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend verifies that the feedback id belongs to the current user and that the user is authorized to reply before performing the operation.
